participant_1.background:
I spend my weekends reading fantasy novels and watching Game of Thrones.
I'm still living with my parents while I save up for my own place.
I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country.
i m an actress and i work at a grocery store.
i think i ll be famous one day.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done.
i have won tap dance competitions.
I enjoy mushroom ravioli with my doberman.
I sometimes cuss in my videos because I think it makes them more entertaining, but I know that it's not appropriate for everyone.
i have driven a race car before.

content.text: Hi! I hope you're having a great day!
Hi! I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking! I'm an actress and I work at a grocery store. What do you do?
I'm a professional tap dancer and I also make YouTube videos!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to tap dance. I love watching your videos!
Thank you so much! It's a lot of fun to do.
What's the hardest thing you've ever done?
That's a tough question... I think building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done.
Wow, that's amazing! I can't even imagine doing something like that.
It was a lot of work, but it was worth it in the end.
I'm sure it was! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a doberman and I love her to death.
Dobermans are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're great dogs!
What's your favorite food?
I love mushroom ravioli!
That sounds delicious! I've never had it before.
You should try it sometime! It's my favorite.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
